action_details: The final hospital assignments for each victim have been determined by consolidating the voting outputs from previous tasks. Victim 1 and Victim 2, who were both unconscious and required a high level of care, received 3 votes each in the injury voting task and thus have been assigned to Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar with a total vote count of 5. Victim 3, who had coughing symptoms and minor injuries, was sent to Hospital Pascual San Rafael with a total vote count of 2.
